n=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number of elements in the array:"))
x=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  x[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter a value:"))
}
print(x)
if(n%%2!=0){
  temp=0
  for(i in seq(1,n-2,2)){
    temp=x[i]
    x[i]=x[i+1]
    x[i+1]=temp
  }
}else{
  for(i in seq(1,n-1,2)){
    temp=x[i]
    x[i]=x[i+1]
    x[i+1]=temp
  }
}
x
